page.title: 15CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: In the Witheridge area there are a number of clubs and societies which cater for all ages.Many of them meet at the Parish Hall which is registered with the charity commissioners. For young people there are cubs and brownies , girl guides and scouts. There is also a youth club which has its own premises.For the very young there is a playgroup which meets twice a week.A new group to the area is the majorettes. Adults have clubs ranging from an over-60's club , Women's Institute , young farmers club and a gardening society.There is a flourishing Drama Group which presents a play annually.
